DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether meal replacement , SlimWell Â® , effective treatment obesity patient metabolic syndrome .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Meal Replacement Weight Loss Obesity Patients With Metabolic Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: The participant divide two group : intervention group control group . In intervention group , participant receive meal replacement plus life style modification . In control group , participant receive life style modification . Sample size calculation 69 participant per group . Primary outcome compare weight loss intervention group control group .
DOC.criteria: Body mass index equal 25 kg/m2 Patients metabolic syndrome Patients antihypertensive drug , oral hypoglycemic drug lipid lower drug . Uncontrolled diabetes patient Patients gastrointestinal abnormality Patients cardiovascular disease Patients hematologic disorder Patients Glomerular filtration rate le 60 ml/min/1.73m2 Patients drug alcohol abuse Pregnancy lactation
